sources.note: Main landing page. Company describes itself as cloud-based digital health platform for providers, payers, and agencies. Founded 1999, physician-founded.
iClinic EHR product page. High-level description of comprehensive cloud-based EHR for practices of all sizes.
Billing and practice management page. Details on electronic claims, payment posting, scheduling, registration with ID scanning, document manager, MACRA/MIPS compliance.
Lab interfacing page. Direct lab orders, customizable panels, abnormal result notifications, trend tracking. Connectivity with national/local labs, radiology, HIEs.
Telehealth page. HIPAA-compliant video visits integrated within EHR, patient access via app or SMS link.
Care management suite: CCM, RPM, TCM, CoCM, PCM modules. Patient enrollment, care plans, time tracking, automated reporting.
Digital health page listing mobile products: iClinicHealth (patient app), iClinic Anywhere (provider mobile), iClinic Office (iPad app).
iClinic Enterprise launch announcement (Oct 2023). Designed for large physician organizations, MSOs, ACOs, IPAs. Scalability, data sharing, multi-entity compliance.
iClinic marketing/info page. Mentions VBP readiness, care gap identification, RPM/CCM, quality scores, centralized billing, document management. Brief physician testimonials.
iClinicHealth patient app page. Appointment management, lab results with notifications, provider messaging, myMonitor health data tracking, medical records access, prescription management.
ONC mandatory disclosures. iClinic v12.3, certified Dec 2018. Annual per-provider license, monthly subscription. Minimum specs: Win7/Mac, 8GB RAM, broadband. Lists certified criteria.
Zendesk help article on EPCS signup using DUO in iClinic. Confirms EPCS capability with two-factor authentication.
Capterra listing for iClinic. User reviews mention ease of billing, customization, patient charting. Complaints about slow loading, limited shortcuts, data entry limitations.
Third-party customer database. Lists notable customers: Northwell Health, NYC Health + Hospitals, SOMOS Community Care, Pain Physicians NY. Users across 21+ industries.
2020 press release: MDLand selected LiveCare Link+ devices for their RPM solution. Confirms RPM module with physical monitoring devices for chronic care patients.
ZoomInfo company profile. ~75 employees, headquartered in Great Neck, NY. Operations across 4 continents.
